external_games.name: Magic: The Boys Who Love Me

name: Magic: The Boys Who Love Me
summary: A serendipitous and thrilling encounter unveils the gateway to a magical world! Once you are found on a half-naked sexy boy, you are invited to the most famous collage in the magical world, CMS. Yet, your life seems to pose its own set of challenges without any magic. Fret not, for helping you seamlessly assimilate into the magical tapestry of existence, 6 attractive boys— a prince, a vampire, a werewolf, a doctor, a elf and a dragon— stand ready to accompany you through a romantic adventure within CMS. Amidst the joyous days of romance and sexiness, crisis lurks like a shadow. As the secrets of the magical world gradually surface, so too does your own mysterious power. In this spellbinding journey, you will weave a tale of growth, love, and empowerment.
